name: Stream Train
storyline:
Well tarnation! The train has left the station and you're stuck on the roof of a train holding a stick of dynamite! Twitch integrated game where viewers use chat commands to guess if cards will be higher or lower to avoid obstacles. Ideal for Starting Soon or Break scenes.

(Game can only be played via Twitch so please ensure you have an account. You don't need to be "live" to play. Maximum of 46 players)
summary: Twitch integrated game where viewers use chat commands to guess if cards will be higher or lower to avoid obstacles. Ideal for Starting Soon or Break scenes.
